buttons package¶

Submodules¶

buttons.buttons module¶

Contains all button classes

class buttons.buttons.TextButton(x: int, y: int, width: int, height: int, text: str, function: callable, theme: arcade.gui.Theme)¶

Bases: arcade.gui.TextButton

A simple text box

Parameters

  • x (int) – x position of button

  • y (int) – y position of button

  • width (int) – button width

  • height (int) – button height

  • text (str) – text to display on button

  • function (callable) – function to call when button is pressed

  • theme (arcade.Theme) – button images in an arcade theme

draw_texture_theme() → None¶

Draws the theme items to the button

on_press() → None¶

Called when the button is pressed

on_release() → None¶

Called when the button is realeased
